title: Minder Vegetarian - Taipei Main Station
description: 明德素食園 operates many locations in Taipei; this one is at 承德路一段1號京站店B/3, in a food court downstairs from the Taipei Central Station. Buffet by weight, and also offers various made to order soups and noodle dishes. NOTE: Some of the mock meats or other items may not be vegan, please confirm and inform HappyCow.
streetAddress: 1, Sec. 1, Chengde Rd, Q Square mall food court level B/3
